author: Savannah Morning News
title: Savannah-Chatham police investigating shooting on Oak Forest Drive
text:
SPECIAL OFFER FOR NEW READERS 99 cent digital subscription to savannahnow.com
Subscriber-members get access to ALL our digital products AND become eligible for free event tickets, discount coupons and other benefits. SIGN UP FOR SUBSCRIBER BENEFITS As a Savannah Morning News / savannahnow.com subscriber, you're eligible for members-only discounts. Download your coupons now. By Savannah Morning News An adult male was injured in a shooting that occurred on Oak Forest Drive Tuesday night around 9 p.m., according to Eunicia Baker, Savannah-Chatham police spokeswoman.
The man was taken to the hospital in unknown condition. The shooting occurred outside, but additional details were not known as of 11 p.m.
Police continue to investigate.
